title: verify_jwt_token_validation_and_role_based_access_control
description: Test the authentication endpoints to ensure JWT tokens are correctly issued, validated, and that role-based access control is enforced for USER and ADMIN roles.

title: test_client_crud_operations_with_document_upload_and_search
description: Verify the client management API endpoints for creating, reading, updating, and deleting clients, including document upload functionality and search capabilities.

title: validate_cession_creation_payment_tracking_and_status_monitoring
description: Test the cession management endpoints to ensure salary cessions can be created, payments tracked accurately, documents generated, and status monitored correctly.

title: test_payment_recording_and_tracking_functionality
description: Verify the payment API endpoints to ensure payments associated with cessions can be recorded, updated, and tracked properly.

title: verify_expense_and_income_recording_with_financial_reporting
description: Test the financial management endpoints for recording expenses and income, and generating accurate financial reports and analytics.

title: test_product_and_category_crud_with_stock_tracking
description: Validate the inventory management API endpoints for product and category creation, editing, deletion, and stock tracking functionalities.

title: validate_document_upload_and_management_security
description: Test the document management endpoints to ensure secure PDF uploads, virus scanning, correct storage, and secure access controls.

title: verify_job_and_workplace_management_endpoints
description: Test the job and workplace management API endpoints for CRUD operations and data integrity.
